name: Sayidi
description:
Sayidi is a short RPG in third-person  that offers a narrative adventure as well as turn-based tactical combat.

The Game

Dive into a sidi bou said transformed by gigantic tides in your soapboxes to collect your trophy. All this takes place in a giant role-playing game, with gang wars... it's time to settle scores !
